# Issue 8: Add AI Agent Integration Example

Create an example AI agent that can play the game or act as a GM using DevTools protocol.

## References

- RFC-013: DevTools System Architecture (Future Extensions)

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Example script using OpenAI/Anthropic API
- [ ] Agent can: observe game state, make decisions, execute commands, respond to events
- [ ] Documentation on running the example
- [ ] Clear disclaimer (experimental, not for production)

## Example Scenarios

- **Auto-playtester**: Agent plays through game, reports bugs
- **Dynamic GM**: Agent spawns enemies based on player performance
- **Tutorial guide**: Agent helps new players learn the game

## Location

`dotnet/dev-tools/examples/ai-agent/`

## Labels

- `example`
- `dev-tools`
- `ai`
- `experimental`

## Milestone

DevTools v3.0
